name: Dolce Italia Beef Lasagna
description: This beef lasagna with minced fresh beef fillet is a traditional meat-sauce pasta gratin, easy to warm up in just a few minutes, and contains no preservatives, dyes or sugar. Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
